element.hint: Needed if EPSO wants to allow candidates to fill in their application form in 24 languages or 3 ONLY. Normally they do allow to fill in in 24 languages
element.label: Answers Language
element.name: answers_language

element.hint: It's the language used in the communication with EPSO
element.label: EPSO language
element.name: epso_language

element.hint: Incompatibilities with other languages that means that this language must be different from the one the candidate selected previously as one of the EPSO rule is the candidate must take the cognitive test (Abstract, Verbal, Numerical) in a language that is different from the competency test. Select all languages that must be different than this one.
element.label: Incompatibilities
element.name: incompatibilities

element.hint: It's mandatory that the candidate select this language
element.label: Mandatory
element.name: mandatory

element.hint: Not used anymore as Talent Screener is dismissed
element.label: Talent Screener language
element.name: talent_screener_language
